# Core API

## Getting started

- [Welcome to Commerce Layer](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/readme): How to get started with Commerce Layer and set up your first organization
- [Onboarding tutorial](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/readme/onboarding-tutorial): Sign up for free and place your first order in a snap
- [Manual configuration](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/readme/manual-configuration): A step-by-step guide on how to set up an organization from scratch, using our CLI
- [API specification](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-specification): Basic info about endpoints, resources, credentials, and environments
- [API credentials](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-credentials): An overview of Commerce Layer's API credentials types and how generate them
- [Authentication](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/authentication): How to get your access token, based on OAuth 2.0 grants
- [Client credentials](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/authentication/client-credentials): How to execute the authorization flow and get your access token
- [Password](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/authentication/password): How to execute the authorization flow and get your access token
- [Authorization code](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/authentication/authorization-code): How to execute the authorization flow and get your access token
- [Refresh token](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/authentication/refresh-token): How to execute the authorization flow and get your access token
- [JWT bearer](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/authentication/jwt-bearer): How to execute the authorization flow and get your access token
- [Revoking a token](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/authentication/revoking-a-token): How to revoke any kind of access or refresh token
- [Roles and permissions](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/roles-and-permissions): How to set specific permitted actions for each resource
- [Fetching resources](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/fetching-resources): How to fetch single resources or collections
- [Fetching relationships](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/fetching-relationships): How to directly fetch related resources
- [Including associations](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/including-associations): How to include a resource and its associations in the same request
- [Sparse fieldsets](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/sparse-fieldsets): How to request the API to return only specific fields
- [Sorting results](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/sorting-results): How to request a specific sort for the results of a collection of resources
- [Pagination](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/pagination): How paginated results work
- [Filtering data](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/filtering-data): How to add filters to your requests
- [Creating resources](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/creating-resources): How to create a resource via API
- [Updating resources](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/updating-resources): How to update a resource via API
- [Tagging resources](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/tagging-resources): How to tag a resource via API
- [Deleting resources](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/deleting-resources): How to delete a resource via API
- [Importing resources](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/importing-resources): How to bulk import resources and their relationships
- [Exporting resources](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/exporting-resources): How to bulk export resources and their relationships
- [Cleaning up resources](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/cleaning-resources): How to bulk remove resources and their relationships
- [External resources](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/external-resources): How to manage resources via external serverless functions
- [External order validation](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/external-resources/external-order-validation): How to validate orders via external services
- [External prices](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/external-resources/external-prices): How to manage prices via external services
- [External shipping costs](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/external-resources/external-shipping-costs): How to manage shipping methods cost via external services
- [External payment gateways](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/external-resources/external-payment-gateways): How to manage payments and transactions via external services
- [External promotions](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/external-resources/external-promotions): How to manage custom promotions via external services
- [External tax calculators](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/external-resources/external-tax-calculators): How to manage custom tax calculation via external services
- [Rate limits](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/rate-limits): Information about the restrictions on the number of times a user or client can access Commerce Layer API endpoints within a specified period of time.
- [Handling errors](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/handling-errors): The complete list of response codes
- [Real-time webhooks](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/real-time-webhooks): The complete list of supported events for each resource
- [Callbacks security](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/callbacks-security): How to verify callbacks authenticity

## API reference

- [Introduction](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/readme): A detailed list of all Commerce Layer core resources
- [Addresses](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/addresses): The address object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The address object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/addresses/object): A comprehensive list of the address resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create an address](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/addresses/create): How to create an address via API
- [List all addresses](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/addresses/list): How to fetch a collection of addresses via API
- [Retrieve an address](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/addresses/retrieve): How to fetch a specific address via API
- [Update an address](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/addresses/update): How to update an existing address via API
- [Delete an address](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/addresses/delete): How to delete an existing address via API
- [Adjustments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adjustments): The adjustment object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The adjustment object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adjustments/object): A comprehensive list of the adjustment resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create an adjustment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adjustments/create): How to create an adjustment via API
- [List all adjustments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adjustments/list): How to fetch a collection of adjustments via API
- [Retrieve an adjustment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adjustments/retrieve): How to fetch a specific adjustment via API
- [Update an adjustment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adjustments/update): How to update an existing adjustment via API
- [Delete an adjustment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adjustments/delete): How to delete an existing adjustment via API
- [Adyen gateways](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_gateways): The Adyen gateway object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The adyen gateway object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_gateways/object): A comprehensive list of the adyen gateway resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create an adyen gateway](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_gateways/create): How to create an adyen gateway via API
- [List all adyen gateways](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_gateways/list): How to fetch a collection of adyen gateways via API
- [Retrieve an adyen gateway](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_gateways/retrieve): How to fetch a specific adyen gateway via API
- [Update an adyen gateway](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_gateways/update): How to update an existing adyen gateway via API
- [Delete an adyen gateway](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_gateways/delete): How to delete an existing adyen gateway via API
- [Adyen payments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_payments): The Adyen payment object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The adyen payment object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_payments/object): A comprehensive list of the adyen payment resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create an adyen payment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_payments/create): How to create an adyen payment via API
- [List all adyen payments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_payments/list): How to fetch a collection of adyen payments via API
- [Retrieve an adyen payment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_payments/retrieve): How to fetch a specific adyen payment via API
- [Update an adyen payment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_payments/update): How to update an existing adyen payment via API
- [Delete an adyen payment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/adyen_payments/delete): How to delete an existing adyen payment via API
- [Applications](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/application): The application object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The application object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/application/object): A comprehensive list of the application resource's attributes and relationships
- [Retrieve the application](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/application/retrieve): How to fetch the application via API
- [Attachments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/attachments): The attachment object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The attachment object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/attachments/object): A comprehensive list of the attachment resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create an attachment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/attachments/create): How to create an attachment via API
- [List all attachments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/attachments/list): How to fetch a collection of attachments via API
- [Retrieve an attachment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/attachments/retrieve): How to fetch a specific attachment via API
- [Update an attachment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/attachments/update): How to update an existing attachment via API
- [Delete an attachment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/attachments/delete): How to delete an existing attachment via API
- [Authorizations](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/authorizations): The authorization object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The authorization object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/authorizations/object): A comprehensive list of the authorization resource's attributes and relationships
- [List all authorizations](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/authorizations/list): How to fetch a collection of authorizations via API
- [Retrieve an authorization](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/authorizations/retrieve): How to fetch a specific authorization via API
- [Update an authorization](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/authorizations/update): How to update an existing authorization via API
- [Avalara accounts](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/avalara_accounts): The Avalara account object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The avalara account object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/avalara_accounts/object): A comprehensive list of the avalara account resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create an avalara account](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/avalara_accounts/create): How to create an avalara account via API
- [List all avalara accounts](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/avalara_accounts/list): How to fetch a collection of avalara accounts via API
- [Retrieve an avalara account](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/avalara_accounts/retrieve): How to fetch a specific avalara account via API
- [Update an avalara account](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/avalara_accounts/update): How to update an existing avalara account via API
- [Delete an avalara account](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/avalara_accounts/delete): How to delete an existing avalara account via API
- [Axerve gateways](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_gateways): The Axerve gateway object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The axerve gateway object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_gateways/object): A comprehensive list of the axerve gateway resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create an axerve gateway](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_gateways/create): How to create an axerve gateway via API
- [List all axerve gateways](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_gateways/list): How to fetch a collection of axerve gateways via API
- [Retrieve an axerve gateway](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_gateways/retrieve): How to fetch a specific axerve gateway via API
- [Update an axerve gateway](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_gateways/update): How to update an existing axerve gateway via API
- [Delete an axerve gateway](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_gateways/delete): How to delete an existing axerve gateway via API
- [Axerve payments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_payments): The Axerve payment object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The axerve payment object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_payments/object): A comprehensive list of the axerve payment resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create an axerve payment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_payments/create): How to create an axerve payment via API
- [List all axerve payments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_payments/list): How to fetch a collection of axerve payments via API
- [Retrieve an axerve payment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_payments/retrieve): How to fetch a specific axerve payment via API
- [Update an axerve payment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_payments/update): How to update an existing axerve payment via API
- [Delete an axerve payment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/axerve_payments/delete): How to delete an existing axerve payment via API
- [Bing geocoders](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bing_geocoders): The Bing geocoder object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The bing geocoder object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bing_geocoders/object): A comprehensive list of the bing geocoder resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create a bing geocoder](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bing_geocoders/create): How to create a bing geocoder via API
- [List all bing geocoders](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bing_geocoders/list): How to fetch a collection of bing geocoders via API
- [Retrieve a bing geocoder](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bing_geocoders/retrieve): How to fetch a specific bing geocoder via API
- [Update a bing geocoder](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bing_geocoders/update): How to update an existing bing geocoder via API
- [Delete a bing geocoder](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bing_geocoders/delete): How to delete an existing bing geocoder via API
- [Braintree gateways](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/braintree_gateways): The Braintree gateway object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint

- [Braintree payments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/braintree_payments): The Braintree payment object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The braintree payment object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/braintree_payments/object): A comprehensive list of the braintree payment resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create a braintree payment](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/braintree_payments/create): How to create a braintree payment via API

- [Bundles](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bundles): The bundle object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The bundle object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bundles/object): A comprehensive list of the bundle resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create a bundle](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bundles/create): How to create a bundle via API

- [Update a bundle](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/bundles/update): How to update an existing bundle via API

- [Buy x pay y promotions](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/buy_x_pay_y_promotions): The buy X pay Y promotion object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint

- [Create a cleanup](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/cleanups/create): How to create a cleanup via API

- [Coupon codes promotion rules](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/coupon_codes_promotion_rules): The coupon codes promotion rule object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The coupon codes promotion rule object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/coupon_codes_promotion_rules/object): A comprehensive list of the coupon codes promotion rule resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create a coupon codes promotion rule](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/coupon_codes_promotion_rules/create): How to create a coupon codes promotion rule via API

- [Update a coupon codes promotion rule](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/coupon_codes_promotion_rules/update): How to update an existing coupon codes promotion rule via API

- [Coupon recipients](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/coupon_recipients): The coupon recipient object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint

- [Delete a coupon recipient](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/coupon_recipients/delete): How to delete an existing coupon recipient via API
- [Coupons](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/coupons): The coupon object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint

- [Update a SKU option](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/sku_options/update): How to update an existing SKU option via API
- [Delete a SKU option](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/sku_options/delete): How to delete an existing SKU option via API
- [SKUs](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/skus): The SKU object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint
- [The SKU object](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/skus/object): A comprehensive list of the SKU resource's attributes and relationships
- [Create a SKU](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/skus/create): How to create a SKU via API
- [List all SKUs](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/skus/list): How to fetch a collection of SKUs via API
- [Retrieve a SKU](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/skus/retrieve): How to fetch a specific SKU via API
- [Update a SKU](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/skus/update): How to update an existing SKU via API
- [Delete a SKU](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/skus/delete): How to delete an existing SKU via API
- [Stock items](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/stock_items): The stock item object and the allowed CRUD operations on the related resource endpoint

- [Create a stock item](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/api-reference/stock_items/create): How to create a stock item via API

## How-tos

- [Introduction](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/readme): How-tos, tutorials and everything you need to build with Commerce Layer
- [Product listing page](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/product-discovery/product-listing-page): How to display prices for a list of products
- [Product page](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/product-discovery/product-page): How to display price and availability on a product page
- [Shopping cart](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/shopping-cart): How to add a shopping cart to your website
- [Creating a shopping cart](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/shopping-cart/create-a-shopping-cart): How to create a new shopping cart (draft order)
- [Adding products to cart](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/shopping-cart/add-to-cart): How to add new items to your shopping cart
- [Updating cart quantities](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/shopping-cart/update-quantity): How to update the quantity of an item in your shopping cart
- [Removing products from cart](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/shopping-cart/remove-from-cart): How to remove an item from your shopping cart
- [Displaying the cart summary](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/shopping-cart/displaying-the-cart-summary): How to show an order summary to your customers
- [Checkout](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/checkout): How to checkout an order as guest or logged customer
- [Adding the customer](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/checkout/adding-the-customer-email): How to add a customer to the order
- [Adding a billing address](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/checkout/adding-a-billing-address): How to add a billing address to the order
- [Adding a shipping address](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/checkout/adding-a-shipping-address): How to add a shipping address to the order
- [Selecting a shipping method](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/checkout/selecting-a-shipping-method): How to select a shipping method for each of the order shipments
- [Selecting a payment method](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/checkout/selecting-a-payment-method): How to select a payment method for the order
- [Adding a payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/checkout/adding-a-payment-source): How to add a payment source to the order
- [Adding a gift card or coupon](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/checkout/adding-a-gift-card-or-coupon): How to redeem a gift card or coupon by entering a code
- [Placing the order](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/checkout/placing-the-order): How to authorize the payment and place the order
- [Subscriptions](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/subscriptions): How to generate scheduled recurring orders from a source order
- [Configuring a subscription model](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/subscriptions/configuring-a-subscription-model): How to create a subscription model to set the available subscription frequencies and the subscription strategy for a market
- [Selecting the source order](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/subscriptions/selecting-the-source-order): How to set the subscription first run and add the line items from which to generate the subscriptions
- [Generating the subscriptions](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/subscriptions/generating-the-subscriptions): How to trigger the subscription generation based on the source order and the subscription model configuration
- [Updating the subscriptions](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/subscriptions/updating-the-subscriptions): How to customize the next subscription occurrences
- [Payments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments): How to pay for an order using one of the supported payment gateways
- [Adyen](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/adyen): How to pay for an order using Adyen payment gateway
- [Adding the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/adyen/adding-the-payment-source): How to add an Adyen payment source to an order
- [Sending back the payment details](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/adyen/sending-back-the-payment-details): How to submit a payment request to Adyen
- [Configuring the notification webhooks](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/adyen/configuring-the-notification-webhooks): How to set up Adyen's notification system
- [Reusing the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/adyen/reusing-the-payment-source): How to save the payment source into the customer wallet so that it can be reused
- [Axerve](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/axerve): How to pay for an order using Axerve payment gateway
- [Adding the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/axerve/adding-the-payment-source): How to add a Axerve payment source to an order
- [Updating the payment intent](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/axerve/updating-the-payment-intent): How to update the Axerve payment intent amount
- [Braintree](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/braintree): How to pay for an order using Braintree payment gateway
- [Adding the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/braintree/adding-the-payment-source): How to add a Braintree payment source to an order
- [Sending back the payment method nonce](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/braintree/sending-back-the-payment-method-nonce): How to send the payment method nonce you receive from Braintree back to Commerce Layer
- [Accepting local payments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/braintree/accepting-local-payments): How to support Braintree local payments
- [Reusing the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/braintree/reusing-the-payment-source): How to save the payment source into the customer wallet so that it can be reused
- [Checkout.com](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/checkout.com): How to pay for an order using Checkout.com payment gateway
- [Adding the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/checkout.com/adding-the-payment-source): How to add a Checkout.com payment source to an order
- [Getting the payment details](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/checkout.com/getting-the-payment-details): How to collect payment details from Checkout.com
- [Refreshing pending transactions](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/checkout.com/refreshing-pending-transactions): How to refresh the status of pending transactions
- [Reusing the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/checkout.com/reusing-the-payment-source): How to save the payment source into the customer wallet so that it can be reused
- [Klarna](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/klarna): How to pay for an order using Klarna payment gateway
- [Adding the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/klarna/adding-the-payment-source): How to add a Klarna payment source to an order
- [Sending back the authorization token](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/klarna/sending-back-the-authorization-token): How to submit a payment request to Klarna
- [Reusing the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/klarna/reusing-the-payment-source): How to save the payment source into the customer wallet so that it can be reused
- [PayPal](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/paypal): How to pay for an order using PayPal payment gateway
- [Adding the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/paypal/adding-the-payment-source): How to add a PayPal payment source to an order
- [Preparing the payment for execution](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/paypal/preparing-the-payment-for-execution): How to make a payment ready to be executed on Paypal
- [Stripe](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/stripe): How to pay for an order using Stripe payment gateway
- [Adding the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/stripe/adding-the-payment-source): How to add a Stripe payment source to an order
- [Refreshing the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/stripe/refreshing-the-payment-source): How to refresh the Stripe payment status
- [Reusing the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/stripe/reusing-the-payment-source): How to save the payment source into the customer wallet so that it can be reused
- [Manual payments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/manual-payments): How to pay for an order using a manual payment gateway
- [Adding a wire transfer payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/manual-payments/adding-a-wire-transfer-payment-source): How to add an wire transfer payment source to an order
- [External payments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/external-payments): How to pay for an order using an external payment gateway
- [Adding the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/external-payments/adding-the-payment-source): How to add an external payment source to an order
- [Reusing the payment source](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/payments/external-payments/reusing-the-payment-source): How to save the payment source into the customer wallet so that it can be reused
- [Auto-capture](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/auto-capture): How to make sure your payments are automatically captured as soon as they are authorized
- [Enabling the auto-capture](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/auto-capture/enabling-the-auto-capture): How to enable the auto-capture option for a selected payment method
- [Limiting the auto-capture amount](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/placing-orders/auto-capture/limiting-the-auto-capture-amount): How to enable the auto-capture option only for orders under a certain amount
- [Inventory strategies](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/inventory/strategies): How to manage the available options in terms of order fulfillment.
- [No split](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/inventory/strategies/no-split): How the default inventory strategy works
- [Split shipments](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/inventory/strategies/split-shipments): How to fulfill your orders shipping from the available stock locations
- [Split by line items](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/inventory/strategies/split-by-line-items): How to fulfill your orders creating a separate shipment for each line item
- [Ship from first available (or primary)](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/inventory/strategies/ship-from-first-available-or-primary): How to fulfill your orders shipping from the first stock location available
- [Ship from primary](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/inventory/strategies/ship-from-primary): How to fulfill your orders shipping from the primary stock location
- [Environments and initial setup](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/faq/environments-and-initial-setup): Frequently asked questions about Commerce Layer's environments, how to switch between them, and anything related to an organization's initial setup
- [Authentication and access tokens](https://docs.commercelayer.io/core/how-tos/faq/authentication-and-access-tokens): Frequently asked questions and best practices about what types of tokens you need to request to authenticate to Commerce Layer API and how to manage them
